trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AudioStateChanged" name="AudioStateChanged" href=""></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per il <xref uid="langword_csharp_AudioStateChanged" name="AudioStateChanged" href=""> </xref> evento del <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A> property gets a new instance of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeration when a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> or a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A>proprietà ottiene una nuova istanza del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>enumerazione quando un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>viene generato l'evento.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can obtain the current state of the audio input using the `AudioState` property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes.
trans-unit.target: È possibile ottenere lo stato corrente dell'audio di input utilizzando il `AudioState` proprietà del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>classi.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the new state of audio input to the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nuovo stato di input audio per il riconoscimento.

trans-unit.source: The AudioState property contains one of three values from the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà AudioState contiene uno dei tre valori di <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>enumerazione.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>

trans-unit.source: The state of audio input after a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged"></xref> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato di input audio dopo un <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged"> </xref> viene generato l'evento.
